title: [SOLVED]820-3115 no hdd detect
message:
Is there any common problem with these boards? I have severals and no one detect the hdd.I checked =PP5V_S0_HDD and it jumped from 5V to 3V
Of course I replaced hdd and cable already.

title: [SOLVED]820-3115 no hdd detect
message: Ok, found bad coil but cannot understand why they got bad is hdd and cable is ok.
